purpose.summary: CICS online program that displays a paginated list of 10 users from the USRSEC VSAM file, handles user search via USRIDINI to set browse starting key (or beginning if blank), supports selection for Update (U) or Delete (D) via XCTL, forward/backward paging with PF8/PF7, and Enter/PF3 keys for navigation and return.
purpose.business_context: User administration listing in CardDemo application, allowing search, browse, select for maintenance

inputs.name: USRSEC
inputs.description: VSAM dataset containing user security records with fields like SEC-USR-ID, SEC-USR-FNAME, SEC-USR-LNAME, SEC-USR-TYPE

inputs.name: COUSR0AI
inputs.description: Input map fields for user selection (SEL0001I-USRID10I), search (USRIDINI), page num (PAGENUMI) from USRLST screen

inputs.name: DFHCOMMAREA
inputs.description: CARDDEMO-COMMAREA for passing program state including CDEMO-CU00-INFO (first/last user ID, page num, selection)

inputs.name: EIBAID
inputs.description: CICS attention key identifier (DFHENTER, DFHPF3, DFHPF7, DFHPF8)

outputs.name: COUSR0AO
outputs.description: Output map fields for screen display including user list (USRID01I-UTYPE10I), header (titles, date/time), error message (ERRMSGO), page num (PAGENUMI), cleared search field (USRIDINO)

outputs.name: CARDDEMO-COMMAREA
outputs.description: Updated commarea with page info, selected user for return or XCTL

called_programs.purpose: Transfer control to user update program when 'U' selected
Transfer control to user delete program when 'D' selected
Return to signon screen on first entry or PF3
Return to admin menu on PF3 alternative

business_rules.description: If user selects 'U' or 'u' in any SEL field with corresponding USRID, XCTL to COUSR02C for update
business_rules.logic_summary: EVALUATE on SEL0001I-SEL0010I, check flag and value, then EVALUATE flag=='U/u'

business_rules.description: If user selects 'D' or 'd' in any SEL field with corresponding USRID, XCTL to COUSR03C for delete
Display error for invalid AID keypress
business_rules.logic_summary: EVALUATE EIBAID WHEN OTHER, set error flag and message
conditions: EIBAID NOT IN (DFHENTER, DFHPF3, DFHPF7, DFHPF8)

business_rules.description: Page forward loads next 10 users starting from current position or low-values
business_rules.logic_summary: STARTBR >= key, readnext up to 10, set first/last, check next-page possible

business_rules.description: Page backward loads previous 10 users ending at current position or high-values
business_rules.logic_summary: STARTBR <= key, readprev up to 10 from end, adjust page num

business_rules.description: Handle search input: if USRIDINI not spaces/low-values, set as SEC-USR-ID starting key for browse; else low-values (start from beginning); clear search field after use
business_rules.logic_summary: In PROCESS-ENTER-KEY, conditional MOVE to SEC-USR-ID, then MOVE -1 to USRIDINL and SPACE to USRIDINO
conditions: USRIDINI OF COUSR0AI = SPACES OR LOW-VALUES

transforms.transformation_description: Copy file user ID to indexed map field (1-10) and track first/last for paging
Copy file first name to indexed map field
Copy file last name to indexed map field
Copy file user type to indexed map field
Capture non-space/low selection flag and user ID from map to commarea
Set browse starting key from search input if provided (not spaces/low-values), else low-values; used in STARTBR

copybooks_used.purpose: Defines CARDDEMO-COMMAREA including CDEMO-CU00-INFO for paging and selection state
Defines BMS map structures COUSR0AI (input) and COUSR0AO (output) for USRLST screen
Defines date/time working fields like WS-CURDATE-DATA
Defines SEC-USER-DATA record layout for USRSEC file
Defines BMS constants for mapset handling

paragraphs.purpose: Main control logic: initialize, handle first entry vs reentry, dispatch on EIBAID to process keys and send/receive map

Capture selected user from map SEL/USERID fields and process U/D to XCTL if valid; handle search USRIDINI to set SEC-USR-ID browse start key (low-values if blank), clear search fields (USRIDINL/USRIDINO), load first page forward
Handle previous page (backward) if not first page, else message
Handle next page (forward) if more pages, else message
Browse forward: startbr/readnext 10 records from SEC-USR-ID key, initialize/populate map, check next page possible
Browse backward: startbr/readprev 10 records from SEC-USR-ID key, initialize/populate map, adjust page num
Move current SEC-USER-DATA fields to indexed map fields 1-10, track first/last
Clear indexed map fields 1-10 to spaces
XCTL to previous program (COSGN00C or set CDEMO-TO-PROGRAM) with commarea
Populate header/date/time, send map with/without ERASE
Receive map into COUSR0AI with resp codes
Set screen header with titles, tranid, pgmname, current date/time
CICS STARTBR on USRSEC at SEC-USR-ID key, handle resp (NOTFND/OTHER errors)
CICS READNEXT into SEC-USER-DATA, handle ENDFILE/OTHER errors
CICS READPREV into SEC-USER-DATA, handle ENDFILE/OTHER errors

error_handling.action: NOTFND: set EOF, message 'top of page'; OTHER: set ERR-FLG, message 'Unable to lookup User', send screen

error_handling.condition: WS-RESP-CD = DFHRESP(ENDFILE) or NOT NORMAL in READNEXT
error_handling.action: Set EOF, message 'bottom of page', send screen

error_handling.condition: WS-RESP-CD = DFHRESP(ENDFILE) or NOT NORMAL in READPREV
error_handling.action: Set EOF, message 'top of page', send screen
Set WS-ERR-FLG 'Y', invalid key message, send screen
Set error message 'Invalid selection. Valid values are U and D'

cics_operations.purpose: Return to CICS with new transaction and updated commarea
Send user list screen with cursor, optional ERASE
Establish browse starting at key for forward/backward
Read next user record in browse
Read previous user record in browse
Transfer control to selected maintenance program

open_questions.question: Exact programs that call this via XCTL or LINK
open_questions.context: Inferred from CDEMO-TO-PROGRAM usage like COSGN00C but no direct evidence in code
open_questions.suggestion: Analyze calling programs or CICS traces

open_questions.question: Precise layout and all fields of copybooks like CSUSR01Y, COUSR00
open_questions.context: Fields inferred from usage (e.g. SEC-USR-ID) but full structure unknown without copybook source
open_questions.suggestion: Provide copybook sources for next iteration

open_questions.question: Business meaning of USER-TYPE values
open_questions.context: Field copied but no validation or description in code
